Public Function Read (offset As Long, buffer As Char(), offsetInBuffer As Integer, count As Integer) As Long
public: long Read(long offset, cli::array <char> ^ buffer, int offsetInBuffer, int count);

param.name: offset
param.span: 实例中所含值的 值偏移量。

span.span: An value offset into the value that is contained in the instance.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 向其复制的字符数组缓冲区。

span.span: The character array buffer to copy into.

param.name: offsetInBuffer
param.span: 缓冲区中的一个 整数偏移量，以启动“复制到”操作。

span.span: An integer offset into the buffer to start copying into.

param.name: count
param.span: 一个 整数值，表示要复制的字符数。

span.span: An integer value representing the number of characters to copy.

summary.span: 将此 实例中的字符复制到传入缓冲区中，并返回复制的字符数。

span.span: Copies characters from this instance to the passed-in buffer and returns the number of copied characters.

returns.span: 表示已复制字节数的 值。

span.span: An value representing the number of copied bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尝试读取超出，将引发异常。If an attempt is made to read beyond , an exception is thrown. 如果`count`指定更多的字符超过可从要复制`offsetInBuffer`仅可用的字符复制到值的末尾。If `count` specifies more characters to be copied than are available from the `offsetInBuffer` to the end of the value, only the available characters are copied. 如果目标缓冲区为空引用，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer is a null reference. 如果目标缓冲区无法接收请求的尽可能多的字符，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer cannot receive as many characters as requested.

summary.span: 将传入缓冲区中的字符复制到此 实例中。

span.span: Copies characters from the passed-in buffer to this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此操作会写入到的位置超出之内，更新以反映新的结束位置。If this operation writes to a position beyond but within , is updated to reflect the new ending position. 值`offsetInBuffer`必须小于或等于。The value of `offsetInBuffer` must be less than or equal to . 否则将引发异常。An exception is thrown otherwise. 写入到的 null 值实例时，可以指定仅值为 0。Only a value of 0 can be specified when writing to a null value instance. 如果尝试编写超出，将引发异常。If an attempt is made to write beyond , an exception is thrown.
